title.native: この中に1人, 妹がいる！
title.romaji: Kono Naka ni Hitori, Imouto ga Iru!
title.english: NAKAIMO - My Little Sister Is Among Them!

description:
Is insanity hereditary? Shougo Mikadono's beginning to think so, because the terms of his late father's will seem crazy and following them may drive Shougo bonkers as well. Oh, it sounds simple at first: before Shougo can claim his VERY large inheritance, he just has to start attending a certain new school and find a nice girl to marry. It's a little unromantic, but perfectly do-able, right? After all, all the girls seem quite friendly, so all Shougo has to do is find one he has something in common with. EXCEPT, and here's the kicker, it turns out that Shougo has WAY too much in common with one of them, because she's actually his long lost sister! And he has no idea which one she is! Will Shougo meet and court his Miss Right without committing something very morally wrong? Can he find his future bride without slipping into the wrong set of genes? And if his little sister does reveal herself, just how much will be revealed and under what circumstances?

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Incest
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations between characters who are related by blood.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Swimming
tags.description: Centers around the sport of swimming.

[Profile (Link Plan)](http://link-plan.net/talent_taketatsu.html) | [Website](http://ayanataketatsu.jp) | [Website (Pony Canyon)](https://ayanataketatsu.jp/) | [Website (Fanclub)](https://ayanakoukoku.com/) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/ayana_taketatsu/) | [(Old) Blog](https://ameblo.jp/strawberry-ayana/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ayana_take) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayachi_official/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/taketatsuofficial) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/27399.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ayana_Taketatsu) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/竹達彩奈)

Attended Nihon Narration Engi Kenkyuujo before becoming affiliated with her first management company. She works for Link Plan and was formerly affiliated with I'm Enterprise and Assemble Heart. Because of her strong voice, she often voiced tsundere characters.

She is a member of the duo [Petit Milady](https://anilist.co/staff/116523/petit-milady) with fellow voice actress [Aoi Yuuki](https://anilist.co/staff/101686/Aoi-Yuuki).

She married voice actor [Yuuki Kaji](https://anilist.co/staff/95672/) on her 30th birthday in 2019. On June 30, 2022 she announced that she was expecting her first child with Kaji.

[Profile (Sigma Seven)](https://www.sigma7.co.jp/prof/w_58.html) | [Official Blog](https://ameblo.jp/asu-kame/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/asu_kame) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asuka_%C5%8Cgame) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%A4%A7%E4%BA%80%E3%81%82%E3%81%99%E3%81%8B)

She is married to fellow seiyuu [Nobuhiko Okamoto](https://anilist.co/staff/95270).

Masumi Itou is a singer and composer. Ito has composed the soundtracks to many anime television shows and is part of the bands Oranges & Lemons and Heart of Air. She graduated from Musashino College of Music, and her husband is music producer Yoshiyuki Ito.

__Height:__ 153cm

[Profile (Style Cube)](http://stylecube.jp/talents/kaori/index.html) | [Website](http://ishiharakaori.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaori_staff_) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/ishiharakaori/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ishiharakaori_official) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@kaori_ishihara)

She won the award of Best Rookie Actress in the 7th Seiyuu Awards. She was a founding member of the group [StylipS](https://anilist.co/staff/111177), before her graduation from the group on April 20, 2013. She was one half of J-Pop duo [YuiKaori](https://anilist.co/staff/195974/), along with [Yui Ogura](https://anilist.co/staff/105981/) before the group disbanded in 2017.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Frima - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Soldier EG - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Tiara - Fairy Fencer F (VG)

__Height:__ 157 cm (5'2")
__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise (2010-2022), Aoni Production (2022-present)

[Profile](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/sakura-ayane.html) | [Blog (old)](http://www.joqr.co.jp/blog/sakura/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayane.sakura.mg/)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Nearl - Arknights (VG)
- Yae Miko - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Yae Sakura - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Julia - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Dolla - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Devonica - Ohsama Sentai King-Ohger: Adventure Heaven (Movie)
- Rio Sonogami - Date a Live: Rio Reincarnation (VG)
- Prinz Eugen - Azur Lane (VG)

[Official site](http://stylips.jp/)

StylipS is a Japanese pop seiyuu girl group and sub-unit of HAPPY! STYLE under Up Front, which releases through Lantis. It features the same members from the promotional unit Team DEKARIS. StylipS was formed in 2011 to sing the ending theme song for the 2012 anime series [High School DxD](https://anilist.co/anime/11617), where each member would also lend their voice to a character. The group's debut event took place on December 28, 2011.

On April 20, 2013, the staff announced that Yui Ogura and Kaori Ishihara are leaving for their concern about workload impact on their studies in school, and they announced the two new members, Moe Toyota and Miku Itou, on April 27, 2013.

On May 23, 2016, the staff announced the graduation of Maho Matsunaga, who had been absent from performing throughout the previous year due to poor health. The 3-person group has only made several appearances afterwards.

__Members:__
• [Arisa Noto](https://anilist.co/staff/104775) (能登有沙) (Founding member)
• [Moe Toyota](https://anilist.co/staff/118398) (豊田萌絵) (Joined April, 2013)
• [Miku Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/118581) (伊藤美来) (Joined April, 2013)

__Former members:__
• [Kaori Ishihara](https://anilist.co/staff/105217) (石原夏織) (Founding member — Graduated in April, 2013)
• [Yui Ogura](https://anilist.co/staff/105981) (小倉唯) (Founding member — Graduated in April, 2013)
• [Maho Matsunaga](https://anilist.co/staff/106789) (松永真穂) (Founding member — Graduated May, 2016)

__Date of Birth:__ 1975
__Place of Birth:__ Nagoya, Aichi Prefecture, Japan
__Current Residence:__ Tokyo, Japan

__Hajime Taguchi__ is a Japanese novelist who is best known for his work _Nakaimo: My Sister is Among Them!__. In 2007, his novel __Majo Rumika no Akai Ito__ won the Honorable Mention at the F Bunko J light novel rookie award.

(Source: Wikipedia)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tensho_tw) | [Website](http://tenshohp.web.fc2.com/)

Representative director of [Bibury](https://anilist.co/studio/6180/). Often teams up with [Masayuki Nonaka](https://anilist.co/staff/116301/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tensho_tw) | [Website](http://tenshohp.web.fc2.com/)

Representative director of [Bibury](https://anilist.co/studio/6180/). Often teams up with [Masayuki Nonaka](https://anilist.co/staff/116301/).

Website Satou Tenshou is a Japanese animator, formerly belonging to Studio Wanpack, now a member of White Fox. His favourite anime are Sennen Joyuu, Kidou Senshi Gundam: Gyakushuu no Char, and Onegai Teacher. His nickname is MacGuyver. Having only served as an animator since Gad Guard he has shown to be proficient at displaying flowing stuff and its linework as well as excelling at storyboarding and portraying a good sense of camera action.
